name: Abandoned (itch) (E Minor)
description:
Made for Trijam #193: Patience

A and D or arrow keys to move. Space to jump.

Escape the burning forest before the fire and smoke consume you. No one is coming back for you...

Music: Burning Woods - by me

Known Issues: The fire obstacles are kind of wonky. I have no idea why, and I didn't have time to fix them :(
